job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pExperian Consumer Services is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to help deliver personalized financial solutions to our customers The ideal candidate must have the ability to extract insights from data and deliver a ML project from beginning to end including understanding business needs trainingvalidating ML models and deploying ML models to applications In addition the candidate must be able to thrive in a complex and fastpaced environmentbrbrppstrong brbrstrongppstrongAbout us but well be briefbrbrstrongpp brbrppExperian is the worlds leading global information services company unlocking the power of data to create more opportunities for consumers businesses and society We are thrilled to share that FORTUNE has named Experian one of the 100 Best Companies to work for In addition for the last five years weve been name in the 100 Worlds Most Innovative Companies by Forbes Magazinebrbrpp brbrppstrongWhat youll be doingbrbrstrongpp brbrpp       Develop machine learning algorithms with huge data sets to solve challenging business questionsbrbrpp brbrpp       Improve performances of existing ML algorithmsbrbrpp brbrpp       Partner with data scientists to discover new data sources and create new input features for ML modelsbrbrpp brbrpp       Build end to end data pipeline for ML modelsbrbrpp brbrpp       Implement stateoftheart experimental systems and evaluate model performancesbrbrpp brbrpp       Communicate key analytical results to stakeholdersbrbrpp brbrppstrongWhat your background looks likebrbrstrongpp brbrpp       Advanced degree in a quantitative field Machine Learning Data science Computer Science etc or equivalent professional experiencebrbrpp brbrpp       2 years of work experience in a quantitative field such as data science or statistical modeling using cloud computing services such as AWS Google Cloud Platform Snowflake Databricks etc Experience with ecommerce and digital marketing is preferredbrbrpp brbrpp       Experience with statistical modeling techniques such as regression support vector machines and neural nets Experience with natural language processing is a plus Experience with deep learning algorithms such as convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks is a plusbrbrpp brbrpp       Experience with clustercomputing framework such as Hadoop or Sparkbrbrpp brbrpp       Working knowledge of Data Science tools eg Numpy Pandas Scikit Tensorflow Keras Rbrbrpp brbrpp       Experience with data processing tools eg SQLbrbrpp brbrpp       Experience with version control systems ie Git GitHub and writing production ready codebrbrpp brbrpp       Excellent oral and written communication skillsbrbrpp brbrpp brbrppstrongPerksbrbrstrongpp       During this pandemic all Experian employees are working remotely Once its safe to do so well slowly return to our offices however we are in no rush to do this The safety of our employees is of utmost importancebrbrpp brbrpp       Three weeks of vacation to start five sick days and two volunteer days plus eleven paid holidaysbrbrpp brbrpp       Competitive pay and comprehensive benefits package with a bonus target of 10brbrpp brbrpp       Flexible work schedule and relaxed dress codebrbrbrbrpstrongAdditional InformationbrbrstrongpAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelinesbrbrppemExperian is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer Our goal is to create a thriving inclusive and diverse team where people love their work and love working together We believe that diversity equity and inclusion is essential to our purpose of creating a better tomorrow We value the uniqueness of every individual and want you to bring your whole authentic self to work For us this is The Power of YOU and it ensures that we live what we believebrbremp
